page.title: 16CHANGING TIMES continued.
page.content: There was a little Fish Shop where the fruit shop is now.There was a little Grocers Shop and a wool shop which was changed into a bicycle shop. {Clothing.}There were not so many different materials.Clogs were worn by men and boys so they needed alot of cobblers.You could sometimes see ladies and girls wearing them. {Schools.}In the 1930's the schools at Allenheads,Carr Shield, Spartylea, Sinderhope and Catton were all open so there were more schools.At school children were punished harder.Children left school at fourteen and still had scars on their hands from when they left school. {Entertainment.}There was more entertainment.There was a circus nearly every year.There was a carnival and fancy dress at New Year.There was a film show in the church hall every
